# Ghost (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* | Aluvan |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Cast ectomancy spells at +1 caster level.

**Ghost Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Protection from Possession (Spell)|Protection from Possession]]****:** Warded creature cannot be possessed or mentally controlled.

**2 [[Hold Person or Ghost (Spell)|Hold Person or Ghost]]:** As *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]]*, but also affecting ghosts.

**3 Undead Bane Weapon:** Weapon gains the *undead bane* property and is considered blessed.

**4** **[[Proper State (Spell)|Proper State]]****:** Transforms willing incorporeal undead into a ghost.

**5** **[[Contingent Spell Lock (Spell)|Contingent Spell Lock]]****:** You store prepared spells or slots to use immediately if you become a ghost.

**6** **[[Undeath to Death (Spell)|Undeath to Death]]****:** As *[[Circle of Death (Spell)|circle of death]]*, but affecting only undead.

**7** **[[Repel Ectoplasm (Spell)|Repel Ectoplasm]]****:** As *[[Repel Wood (Spell)|repel wood]]*, but affecting only ectoplasm.

**8** **[[Trap the Soul (Spell)|Trap the Soul]]****:** Imprisons subject within gem (works on ghosts only).

**9** **[[Forcecage (Spell)|Forcecage]]****:** Cube of force imprisons all inside.
